shapes3d.utils

Interface ContourScale

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CS_ConstantScale, CS_LinearScale

    public interface ContourScale
    This interface provides the method required to define the scale factor to be applied to the contour at various points along the extrusion's length.
    Author:
    Peter Lager

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      float scale(float t)
      A parametric method that returns a scale factor for the normalised position along the extrusion path.

    • Method Detail

      • scale

        float scale(float t)
        A parametric method that returns a scale factor for the normalised position along the extrusion path.
        Parameters:
        t - the normalied position must be >=0 and <=1
        Returns:
        the scale factor at position t
